level.text: The applicant or client may appeal the final decision of the Director by filing a petition for review in the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with the rules and procedures prescribed by the court.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 38 DCR 2034 (April 5, 1991); as amended by 54 DCR 6020 (June 22, 2007).
